Package com.konakartadmin.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiAnalysis
    Analyses the API calls collected in the specified input file For file that's specified must be a KonaKart log file that had the following log flags set: log4j.logger.com.konakart.bl.KKApiMgr = DEBUG
    ConvertFileEncoding
    Convert the encoding of the specified files from one encoding to another
    CreateEnterpriseDB
    Creates the store2 - for EngineMode 2 only - Multi-Store Single-DB
    CreatePassword
    A utility for creating encrypted property values for KonaKart
    DataIntegrityChecker
    Checks the Integrity of the KonaKart Database
    InstallDefaultModule
    Installs the specified Module
    KKCmd
    A utility for running KonaKart commands from the command line
    KKEngineUtils
    For creating KonaKart engines
    KKMessages
    A utility for operating on KonaKart Messages
    LoadProductsToSolr
    Enables SOLR then loads all the products
    ModuleUtils
    Module Utils
    RemoveModule
    Removes the specified Module
    ReplaceTextInFile
    Replace one String with another String in all files that match the pattern using the specified encoding
    ResetDatabase
    Reset the database - this removes all the data in a KonaKart system other than that required to start loading new data once again.
    RunReport
    Runs a BIRT report and writes the output to a directory.
    SetLocalConfiguration
    A utility for setting the local KonaKart configuration
    SqlAnalysis
    Analyses the SQL collected in the specified input file For file that's specified must be a KonaKart log file that had the following log flags set: log4j.logger.org.apache.torque.util.BasePeer = DEBUG
    SqlPopulator
    Populates the db for the specified storeId with standard data - getting data from store1.
